faq.intro: Find quick answers to the most common questions about FUTA TRANS.

q1.question: How do I pay for a ride?
q1.answer: Scan the driver's QR Code or enter their ID. Confirm the amount ‚Äî done!

q2.question: I am a driver. How do I collect payments?
q2.answer: Create a FUTA TRANS account, generate your QR code or unique code, and start collecting payments.

q3.question: Is my money safe?
q3.answer: Yes. All payments are secured with licensed partners (Mobile Money, banks). Your data is encrypted.

q4.question: Can I withdraw received funds?
q4.answer: Yes. You can transfer your balance to your bank account or Mobile Money wallet at any time.

q5.question: How do I top up my wallet?
q5.answer: Top up your FUTA TRANS wallet securely via Mobile Money (M-Pesa, Orange Money, Airtel Money‚Ä¶) or bank card (VISA, MasterCard).

q6.question: Where is FUTA TRANS available?
q6.answer: We are present in Kinshasa and expanding to other major cities in DRC.

q7.question: Does FUTA TRANS work offline?
q7.answer: An Internet connection is required to use the app. Some features (history, balance) may be temporarily available offline.

q8.question: Can I cancel a payment after sending?
q8.answer: No. Once confirmed, a payment is irreversible. Always double-check details before confirming.

q9.question: How do I report an issue with a driver or passenger?
q9.answerPrefix: Use the report feature in the app or write to

q10.question: Does FUTA TRANS offer customer support?
q10.answer: Yes. Our support team is available by email or phone Monday to Saturday, 8am to 6pm.

policy.intro1: At FUTA TRANS, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our mobile app to pay for rides.
policy.intro2: Our goal is to provide a secure and transparent payment service while strictly respecting your privacy.

collectedData.title: 1. The data we collect
collectedData.intro: To provide our payment service, we collect the following types of information:

items.personal: Personal information: name, phone number, email address ‚Äî required to secure your account.
items.payment: Payment information: data needed to process your transactions (Mobile Money, bank card), handled by certified providers.
items.usage: Usage data: payment history, amounts, frequency ‚Äî to improve the service and prevent fraud.
items.technical: Technical data: device type, model, OS version, and app version ‚Äî to ensure compatibility.
items.location: Geolocation information: collected with your explicit consent to enhance security.

useOfData.title: 2. How and why we use your data
useOfData.intro: Your information is essential for the following purposes:

items.execution: Payment execution: process and validate your transactions quickly and securely.
items.security: Security and authentication: protect your account and prevent fraudulent activities.
items.improvement: Service improvement: analyze usage to optimize the platform.
items.communication: Communication: important notifications related to your transactions and security.
items.legal: Legal compliance: obligations regarding anti-money laundering, fraud, and counter-terrorism financing.
items.offers: Personalized offers: with your consent, tailored proposals (loyalty, partner financial services).

sharing.title: 3. Data sharing
sharing.intro: We prioritize your privacy. We do not sell or rent your personal information. It may be shared only with:

items.providers: Technical providers: payment, hosting, security ‚Äî bound by strict confidentiality commitments.
items.partners: Financial or institutional partners: with your explicit consent, for specific services (leasing, credit).
items.authorities: Regulatory authorities: when required by law (warrant, official investigation, etc.).

security.title: 4. Data security
security.text: Rigorous technical and organizational measures: encryption at rest and in transit, firewalls, and strict access controls.

rights.title: 5. Your rights
rights.intro: You remain in control of your personal data. Under applicable laws, you have the following rights:

items.access: Right of access: obtain a copy of your personal data.
items.rectification: Right to rectification: correct or update your information.
items.erasure: Right to erasure: delete your account and data, subject to legal obligations.
items.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent: for example, for geolocation data.

rights.contactText: To exercise your rights or for any questions, contact us:

items.fraud: Fraudulent or illegal use of the app.
items.breach: Serious breach of these Terms and Conditions.

availability.text: Service available 24/7, except in cases of force majeure, maintenance or technical incidents beyond our control. No compensation for temporary interruption.
